column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday August 21 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N at Exit 113 (Paris Pike)
column4: Two lanes are blocked until further notice due to a semi fire.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N at Exit 113 (Paris Pike)
column4: The entrance ramp from Paris Pike to I-75N is closed.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N at Exit 113 (Paris Pike)
column4: Motorists may use Newtown Pike to access I-75N and avoid the traffic back up.
